radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver appears normal in size and echotexture. There are no concerning focal liver lesions seen. The portal vein is patent with normal flow. There is no evidence of ascites. There are 3 freely mobile gallstones within the lumen of the gallbladder measuring 1.7 cm, 1.6 cm, and 1.0 cm. The gallbladder is nondistended, with a thin wall, without pericholecystic fluid, nor sonographic ___ sign. The visualized portions of the abdominal aorta and inferior vena cava are normal. The pancreas is incompletely imaged due to overlying bowel gas; however, the head and proximal body feature no abnormalities.
